|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = N89-NU260HS |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 3C:77:E6
|chip1 = Marvell;88W8797;88W8797-BMP2, PKRG370.1JW, L233-B0P, TW E; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |802.11n = 300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is filed under a '''[[CyberTAN]]''' grantee code.. but would seem to be a '''[[Foxconn]]''' manufactured device.
"M26H003", "REV.0 GP", and "801357" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A MAC label w/ a 3C:77:E6 OUI is affixed to the RF shield. It's presumed to be used.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
